entry.title: IOPA 1.4 Released
entry.content:
IOPA 1.4 is the current version of the Internet of Protocols Alliance specification.

It has been validated against HTTP, CoAP, MQTT, UPNP, SSDP, TCP, and UDP protocols.
entry.summary:
IOPA 1.4 is the current version of the Internet of Protocols Alliance specification.

It has been validated against HTTP, CoAP, MQT

entry.title: IOPA 1.1 Released
entry.content:
IOPA 1.1 is the fist stable version of the Internet of Protocols Alliance specification.

It has been validated against HTTP, TCP, and UDP protocols.
entry.summary:
IOPA 1.1 is the fist stable version of the Internet of Protocols Alliance specification.
